properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 4 at 7:03AM EST until January 5 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE
THROUGH THE WEEKEND... ...LOW WATER CONDITIONS EXPECTED EARLY
SUNDAY MORNING ON TIDAL RIVERS...

.A strong cold front will approach the region tonight and pass
through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to 30 knots
this evening over the coastal waters, becoming west to northwest
and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night
into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and very rough waters expected. For the Low
Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Pamlico and Pungo Rivers.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 7 AM
EST Sunday. For the Low Water Advisory, from 10 PM this
evening to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
